st:Description.name: GeneralPCS
st:Description.st:role: Setting to manage performance, capacity and scalability tuning

st:attribute.Name: UndoMax
st:attribute.st:role: Maximum number of undoable global transactions per document
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Maximum number of commands or editions in context which can be undone for each document. 0 means that only local transactions of the current command or edition in context are undoable.

st:attribute.Name: CheckMultiEditorUndo
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activating this setting prevents any unpredictable behavior in the Undo/Redo process if a document is open in several editors for modification purpose.

st:attribute.Name: StackFullWarning
st:attribute.st:role: Activation flag for stack full warning
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the behavior when the Undo/Redo stack becomes full. 0 means that no warning is displayed, 1 displays an easy warning, 2 displays a notify box requesting a user commitment.
